itunes:title: #158 - Tarot Archetypes to Build Business Confidence with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot
title: #158 - Tarot Archetypes to Build Business Confidence with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot
description:
You might be experimenting with using tarot to help you make business decisions, but what about using it to cultivate more confidence? Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot joins us to talk about using the tarot card archetypes to cultivate more confidence in your business, working with cards that you might feel resistant to, and making money by doing something spiritual for a living.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting

Get full show notes for this episode here

---
